name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s simple-gaussianElim.vcl -t Marabou -o simple-gaussianElim.inputquery/ --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s simple-gaussianElim.vcl -t LossFunction -o simple-gaussianElim.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE
